body:
You must be the new student.
Working from a game developer convention eh?
Our med school gets all kinds..

Alright, we'll take things slow.
Hah!
Here's your first patient.
Just press SPACE on the SEVENTH BEAT.
 Good luck!

title: 1 Miss
body:
Almost!
Try really hitting your spacebar HARD, and listen to that mighty clack. It helps your timing!

title: 1 Perfect
body:
Oh, look at you.
You clearly know how to do this already.
Congratulations.
That's it. One more time, without cues.

Alright. You've got the hang of it.
Your first patient is waiting outside.
He's got quite the heart rate..
Well, good luck.

title: 1 No Input
body:
Oh dear.
Remember to hit the spacebar on the SEVENTH BEAT.

title: 0 No Input
body:
Oh, hit the spacebar to advance the text.
There we go.

title: EveryBeat
body:
HEY!!
You dont have to press on every beat! Just the SEVENTH.
